title: low priority queue
body: why am i in low priority queue for 80 minutes?

replies.body: Your [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) shouldn't exceed 20 minutes.  If you're having network issues like packet loss, you may have lost sync with matchmaking while in queue, so the timer is still going even though you're no longer in it.  I recommend taking this time to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up this snag, and testing in a custom game before queuing again.
